content.question: Which of the following is the most likely consequence of a mutation at the operator locus that prevents binding of the repressor protein?

choices.label: Expression of the structural genes will be repressed, even in the presence of lactose.
Beta-galactosidase will be produced, even in the absence of lactose.
RNA polymerase will attach at the Plac locus, but transcription will be blocked.
The operator locus will code for a different protein and thereby prevent transcription of the structural gene.

content.answer: Beta-galactosidase will be produced, even in the absence of lactose.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
